pages.speaker: leader
lines: Gahahahaha! At last...

pages.speaker: leader
lines: AT LAST! I've finally done it!!!

pages.speaker: leader
lines: A new world for human evolution will be born!!!

pages.speaker: leader
lines: We shall stride forward!!!

pages.speaker: admin
lines: Ohh... What have you done...

pages.speaker: admin
lines: Boss... What...

pages.speaker: leader
lines: ...Hm? A message from our members outside?

pages.speaker: leader
lines: What is it?

pages.speaker: leader
lines: So the sun has turned mercilessly fierce in its heat. I should expect so.

pages.speaker: leader
lines: That is what I have longâ€” No, what WE have long wished for.

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run function hoenn:triggers/stopsound');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run playsound countdowntodestruction record @s[tag=!RadioOff] ~ ~ ~ 1 1 1');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run scoreboard players set @s[tag=!RadioOff] MusicCooldown 113');

pages.speaker: leader
lines: What?! The heat is greater than simulations predicted?

pages.speaker: leader
lines: It will be a risk to our own safety if it continues?!

pages.speaker: leader
lines: That cannot be... It has only just awoken...

pages.speaker: leader
lines: Where is it getting so much power from?

pages.speaker: leader
lines: And how much more will it gain when it does undergo Primal Reversion...

pages.speaker: leader
lines: C-continue your readings! Then report back!

pages.speaker: admin
lines: Boss?! Maxie?! Just what's happening on the surface?!

pages.speaker: leader
lines: All that matters is...

pages.speaker: leader
lines: That I have used the Red Orb to awaken Groudon.

pages.speaker: leader
lines: And now... I will transform this planet to a land ideal for humanity.

pages.speaker: rivalleader
lines: Hey, Maxie.

pages.speaker: rivalleader
lines: Looks like we underestimated the power of the super-ancient PokÃ©mon...

pages.speaker: rivalleader
lines: The power of Primal Reversion...

pages.speaker: leader
lines: What...did you say?

pages.speaker: rivalleader
lines: Primal Groudon brings about an "end," all right.

pages.speaker: rivalleader
lines: But you don't get to choose what end.

pages.speaker: rivalleader
lines: It's gonna drive every living thing on this planet to its death!

pages.speaker: rivalleader
lines: The only thing waiting for us is despair.

pages.speaker: rivalleader
lines: A despair we can't even run from. A despair that's gonna crush humanity.

pages.speaker: rivalleader
lines: You blasted fool...

pages.speaker: rivalleader
lines: And it's all happening 'cause you were cocky enough to think you could control the super-ancient PokÃ©mon's power!

pages.speaker: admin
lines: So the information we received from the Weather Institute was true...

pages.speaker: admin
lines: Boss Maxie! We'll never get anywhere just standing around here like this!

pages.speaker: admin
lines: There isn't a moment to spare! We must confirm the situation on the outside!

pages.speaker: admin
lines: Child! You're coming, too! Hurry up!

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run weather clear');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run effect give @s minecraft:blindness 3 1 true');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run scoreboard players set @s MusicTitles 93');
q.run_command('execute unless entity @e[x=1370,y=64,z=-57,dy=3,type=cobblemon:npc] run npcspawnat 1370 64 -57 archie_generic');
q.run_command('execute unless entity @e[x=1373,y=64,z=-49,dy=3,type=cobblemon:npc] run npcspawnat 1373 64 -49 tabitha_generic');
q.run_command('execute unless entity @e[x=1364,y=64,z=-49,dy=3,type=cobblemon:npc] run npcspawnat 1364 64 -49 maxie_generic');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run function hoenn:triggers/stopsound');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run playsound drought record @s[tag=!RadioOff] ~ ~ ~ 1 1 1');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run scoreboard players set @s[tag=!RadioOff] MusicCooldown 81');

pages.speaker: leader
lines: This... This is not...

pages.speaker: admin
lines: What...

pages.speaker: leader
lines: I wanted... I wanted to make...

pages.speaker: leader
lines: It was supposed to be a world where the human race would attain new heights...

pages.speaker: leader
lines: The next stage...of our development...

pages.speaker: leader
lines: It was all...for humanity's future...

pages.speaker: admin
lines: Boss... Maxie...

pages.speaker: rivalleader
lines: So this...is the power of the super-ancient PokÃ©mon...

pages.speaker: rivalleader
lines: This is how Groudon brings everything to an end...

pages.speaker: rivalleader
lines: All of us, people and PokÃ©mon...

pages.speaker: rivalleader
lines: Every living thing on this planet... Everything's gonna die...

pages.speaker: rivalleader
lines: OK, little scamp... We're setting sail for Sootopolis.

pages.speaker: rivalleader
lines: That blasted Groudon is no doubt gonna get there ahead of us.

pages.speaker: rivalleader
lines: It'll be waiting for us deep in the Cave of Origin, there in Sootopolis...

pages.speaker: rivalleader
lines: There's a pool of energy there that folks say is needful for Primal Reversion.

pages.speaker: rivalleader
lines: There's no doubt in my mind that Groudon will be racing to that cave, thirsting for that power...

pages.speaker: rivalleader
lines: We got no choice but to go ourselves. We gotta do whatever we can to fight back!

pages.speaker: rivalleader
lines: All right, Maxie! You Team Magma blighters better come with us.

pages.speaker: rivalleader
lines: We're responsible for this mess. This ridiculous, impossible mess.

pages.speaker: rivalleader
lines: It only makes sense for us all to step up and clean up after ourselves. Agreed?

pages.speaker: leader
lines: Ngh...

pages.speaker: admin
lines: Let's go. Boss Maxie...

pages.speaker: rivalleader
lines: Hey, little scamp. Look, I'm supposed to be a grown-up, right?

pages.speaker: rivalleader
lines: So let me say sorry for the way this has gone down.

pages.speaker: rivalleader
lines: And...I'm sorry 'cause I've gotta ask you to pitch in with the cleanup.

pages.speaker: rivalleader
lines: We need every hand on deck if we're gonna do something about this mess...

pages.speaker: rivalleader
lines: So...I'll be waitin' for you in Sootopolis.

action: q.run_command('execute unless entity @e[x=1359,y=64,z=-64,dy=3] run npcspawnat 1359 64 -64 steven_generic');
q.run_command('execute in minecraft:overworld run tp ' + q.player.username + ' 1363.05 64.00 -59.09 -218.45 8.30');

pages.speaker: steven
lines: I'm sorry I could not be here sooner.

pages.speaker: steven
lines: Terrible...

pages.speaker: steven
lines: So this is what was being depicted in that painting in Granite Cave.

pages.speaker: steven
lines: If this doesn't stop, all Hoennâ€” no, the entire worldâ€”will burn up.

pages.speaker: steven
lines: Nothing could live in such a land of deathâ€”neither PokÃ©mon nor humans!

pages.speaker: steven
lines: This dreadful blaze... It must be caused by the sweltering heat wave forming above Sootopolis...

pages.speaker: steven
lines: Come on, Steven... Think! What are you going to do?

pages.speaker: steven
lines: There's no point in agonizing over the situation from here...

pages.speaker: steven
lines: I have to go to Sootopolis. There must be answers there.

pages.speaker: steven
lines: I will count on you to help with this crisis...

pages.speaker: steven
lines: But...please... Promise you won't do anything reckless.

pages.speaker: steven
lines: Well then. I'll go ahead to Sootopolis.

pages.speaker: steven
lines: Good luck to you.
